content.value: Thank you to everyone that came along to listen & to the fabulous speakers at last night's #DevopsNotts - I really enjoyed myself, learned lots & have a long reading list to further educate myself on the subject ‚ù§Ô∏è it was the second time I've talked and you were all so lovely! ü§ó
